item.description:
Wednesday Night Meet & Greet Dance

Dec. 28th.

Dancing at 8:30- 12:30 pm.

Mickees on the Water
512 Middlesex Tpke
Billerica, Ma.

Host: Janice R9  janjanr@comcast.net

Co-host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

No Cover Charge, Dj, Cash Bar-Lottery, & Entertainment.

 

Come on out an join us at any time. Meet some new people, dance ,and enjoy some food and drink. There will be a Dj, taking our music request because he knows we dance. Often times members will arrive earlier for dinner.  Try and arrive before 8:30 if possible for introductions. After 8:30, the Dj starts playing, and everyone is usually on the dance floor. So introductions become difficult that late.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday Night Meet & Greet Dance
